name: SNUFFLE MAT
description1: This snuffle mat is a great toy for your dog who has tons of energy. It allows your dogs to use their brain during their playtime. This activity can wear them out just as much as a walk. Hide the treats or small toy in the snuffle mat, and let your dogs to find it out. It helps to train your dog's sense of smell, drain your dog's energy and also lose weight.
description2: Puzzle Training Mat: This snuffle mat mimic the hunt for food in grass and fields, which satisfies dog's natural curiosity and enhance its superior sense of smell. Promotes mental and physical exercising while reducing stress.Snuffle Training: 10 minutes snuffle=1 hour outdoor running, can help dogs relieve stress and relax when you leave him/her alone at home.Safe & Comfortable: Colorful design made of eco-friendly fabric, durable and non-toxic, prevents from tearing into pieces. 100% safe for your pets.

name: SMART SENSING SNAKE TOY
description1: Sensing Mode Put your hand in front of the toy snake and the snake will begin sliding forward. The eyes of this snake toy will flicker and automatically avoid stuck situations when encountering obstacles. The tongue of this snake toy can flick and its tail can swing. Realistic & Fun Featuring 3D texture and vibrant colors, this snake toy looks realistic, and the segmented body creates a lifelike sliding effect to bring more fun to pets and children. It also makes a perfect prank prop for Halloween parties!
description2: Turn on the S-type switch to make this toy start sliding, and it will enter the deactivated state after about 1 minute of continuous playing. Tap the head of the snake toy to active it and enable it to move.

description2: VIRTUALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE: 100% Non-toxic Cotton - when chewed helps to maintain dental hygiene by flossing the teeth and massaging the gums. Machine washable so your house stays free of harmful bacteria.

description2: ULTIMATE PROTECTION:  Upgraded two-layer structure: sticky layer for more adhesive, and anti-scratch layer that goes against your indoor pet paws from scratching couch, bed, chair, door etc. All 10 pc pads are 17-inch x 12-inch, easily covers a full section of sofa from pet claw damage. 100% transparent - anti dust & easy to clean. FLEXIBLE & STRONG: With 125um Anti-scratch Coating, sleek scratch guard is flexible enough to cover corner of your furniture, and can be easily cut to any shapes according to your furniture. name: INTERACTIVE PET FOOD DISPENSER
description1: Is your precious dog a rapid eater? Or is your beloved cat lazy and prefers to sleep all day long? Keep them healthy and active at the same time by letting them play with the Interactive Pet Food Dispenser Toy.
description2: Keep your pets healthy and active: Since they have to play with the toy to get food, it will require more of an effort to eat. This keeps your pets active and mobile. It even prevents rapid eating as it prolongs your pets feeding so they can digest treats better. Moreover, it provides healthy play that reduces boredom and destructive behaviour.

name: TERRA TOY FISH
description1: Stimulate more Playtime and Reduce Separation Anxiety of your Cat with this Smart & Interactive Floppy Fish Cat Toy
description2: Just like a fish out of water, The Floppy Fish has an action instinct that instantly attracts your cat.  The Floppy Fish Cat toy is an amazing way for your cats to release energy! Make playtime more enjoyable by simulating their fish hunting instincts! It's made of strong durable materials that are safe and non-toxic and it's USB rechargeable. No matter your cat's age, they'll be as playful as a kitten with Floppy Fish.

name: CACTUS TREE TOY
description1: VIVID AND UNIQUE: This lovely cat scratching toy and condo is just like a real cactus for cats to scratch, climb, exercise and rest. Unlike other traditional cat condo, our products are more vivid and durable, suitable for all kinds of cats. name: DOUBLE LAYER CAT LITTER TRAPPING MAT
description1: WORRIED ABOUT YOUR CAT LITTER? WE GOT YOU COVERED üòâ
description2: Anti-Tracking Open Edge:  Double-layer honeycomb design helps you gather the litter. You just pick up the mat and all the litter falls through and then dump it back in the litter box . No more getting litter stuck to your feet on a daily basis! Large holes in this mat is large enough to catch and trap litter.  Waterproof/Urine Proof : Bottom layer is waterproof and also slip-resistant which will not allow any liquid to go through and easy to move. If you have a cat vomit on the mat, you can hose it off. Very easy to clean and be dry. Protect your hardwood floors and carpets from nasty urine stains.Prevent the cat's urine from getting everywhere.  Easy Clean: The litter box mat is made of soft durable and washable EVA. Dirt can be removed easily.You don't have to sweep up or vacuum the litter everyday.Save your time and strength!

name: PET ADJUSTABLE WALKING LEASH
description1: FEATURES
description2: All cat lovers know that cats are very sensitive. Before a cat get used to its harness, it will keep backing off to get rid of the harness. To solve this problem completely, our designer develop this adjustable collar harness.   You can tie or loose the collar to fit your cat's neck circumference so that your lovely cat will never escape the harness again.  In order to let your dear cat get a more comfortable wear experience, We use super soft lightweight polyester mesh fabric to produce this harness. The total weight of this harness is only about 50-100g, so it makes your lovely cat feel comfortable while wearing it. This soft breathable harness can not only keep warm in winter but also keep cool in summer. An excellent choice for cats daily outdoor walking, or some unfamiliar places like pets' hospital or groom room.

Durable Quality: This Pet water bowl is made of environmentally friendly plastic, BPA-free, non-toxic, no odour, and it is good for protecting the health of pets.  Novel Design : 15¬∞ tilt to protect the pet's neck. The tiny design reduces the pressure on the pet's neck and joints, helping the pet to swallow easily. Multifunctional: Two pet bowls are designed for dry wet depart, and it allows multiples pets to eat at the same time. Detachable parts- the bowls are easy to take out for cleaning or adding food.

name: LUXURY PET TOWER
description1: Step-like multi-layer structure design. This Pet tower has 2 roomy condos, 2 top large platform with internal extra-thick mat, 1 sturdy hammock, toys & Natural sisal rope.This design of cat tower is convenient for cat's scratching, climbing, sleeping, and exercising.
description2: Top perch with thick padding at the bottom and rim makes a perfect napping lounge. The ultra-soft plush gives the smoothest touch that your pet will never get enough of, and raised edge of this perch allows your pet rest on its head while watching over the house.  Anti-toppling fittings are included for double security. Constructed by CARB-certified natural particle boards and strengthened with battens at the bottom to ensure overall stability. Reinforced posts are wrapped with natural sisal rope to allow nail scratching and promote exercising satisfying the instincts of your restless kitten.
